Testimonial.h2: Don‚Äôt just take our word for it.
Testimonial.h3: Here‚Äôs what real users are saying.

list.content: This app is a game-changer. I got over 500 EGP in cashback in my first month. The cashback system is so much better than regular discounts.
I love how easy it is to find restaurant deals. I used a coupon for a family dinner and saved a fortune. Highly recommended!
Finally, an app that understands what we need. Great offers at the most famous restaurants in Egypt. It‚Äôs my go-to app before going out.

Faq.description: Here are some of the most common questions we get about Noaat.

list.question: What is Noaat, exactly?
list.answer: Noaat is a free mobile app that gives you real cashback and exclusive coupons at a huge variety of restaurants and cafes in Egypt. Just eat, upload your receipt, and save money.

list.question: Is this a points system?
list.answer: No. We believe in real money, not confusing points. The cashback you earn is actual money (EGP) that gets added to your wallet in the app. You can use it for anything you want.

list.question: How long does it take to get my cashback?
list.answer: It‚Äôs fast. Once you upload a clear receipt, our system typically verifies it and adds the cashback to your wallet within minutes.

list.question: Can I use my cashback balance to buy coupons?
list.answer: Absolutely! That‚Äôs the smartest way to use your balance. You can use your cashback to buy coupons for even bigger discounts, effectively doubling your savings.

list.question: Why does Noaat need access to my location?
list.answer: Noaat uses your location to show you relevant offers and restaurants near you. This helps us provide you with the best deals in your area.

list.question: Why does Noaat need access to my camera?
list.answer: Noaat needs access to your camera to allow you to scan your receipts for cashback. This is a quick and easy way to earn cashback on your purchases.

list.question: How do I create an account?
list.answer: Creating an account with Noaat is simple! Just download the app, enter your phone number, and follow the prompts to receive a verification code. Once verified, you're ready to start saving.

CTA.h3: Download the app and enjoy the strongest cashback and best restaurant deals in Egypt!
CTA.description: Join thousands of users who save with Noaat every day.

About.h2: We are Noaat - the smart cashback system that turns every meal into a savings opportunity at partner restaurants in Egypt.
About.why_content: Noaat isn't just another deals app - it's a complete system that connects you with partner restaurants to get the strongest cashback and save money with every order. We focus on speed and ease of use.
About.mission_content: Our goal is to enable every Egyptian to eat from the restaurants they love while saving money at the same time. We work with hundreds of restaurants to provide the best offers and fastest cashback in Egypt.

HowCashbackWorksPage.h1: The Easiest Cashback System in Egypt
HowCashbackWorksPage.metaDescription: Learn how Noaat's cashback system works. Upload your restaurant receipt and earn real money in your wallet. Get the strongest cashback on food in Egypt.
HowCashbackWorksPage.intro: Say goodbye to complicated points and confusing rewards. Noaat offers the most straightforward cashback system in Egypt. You eat, you save, you get real money back. It‚Äôs that simple.
HowCashbackWorksPage.h2_how_to_earn: How to Earn Cashback with Noaat
HowCashbackWorksPage.step1: Find a Cashback Offer: Open the app and look for restaurants with a "Cashback" badge.
HowCashbackWorksPage.step2: Dine and Pay: Go to the restaurant, enjoy your meal as usual, and ask for the bill.
HowCashbackWorksPage.step3: Scan Your Receipt: Open the Noaat app, tap the 'Upload Receipt' button, and take a clear picture of your entire receipt.
HowCashbackWorksPage.step4: Get Paid: Our system will verify your receipt instantly. Once approved, the cashback amount is added directly to your Noaat wallet.
HowCashbackWorksPage.wallet_desc: Once you have money in your Noaat wallet, you can use your balance to buy coupons for even bigger discounts or transfer your savings.
HowCashbackWorksPage.benefit1: Real Money, Not Points: We give you actual EGP, not points that expire or have limited use.
HowCashbackWorksPage.benefit2: No Restrictions: Use your cashback at any partner restaurant, for any offer.
HowCashbackWorksPage.benefit3: Transparent and Fast: See your earnings in real-time. What you see is what you get.
HowCashbackWorksPage.cta: Browse Cashback Offers Now & Download the App!

CouponsOffersPage.metaDescription: Find the best food discounts in Egypt with Noaat coupons. Learn how to buy and activate a discount code for instant savings.
CouponsOffersPage.intro: Want to save money right now? Our coupons and offers are your ticket to instant food discounts. Noaat partners with the most famous restaurants in Egypt to bring you exclusive deals.
CouponsOffersPage.step1: Browse Coupons: Open the app and go to the "Coupons" section to find the perfect discount code.
CouponsOffersPage.step2: Buy the Coupon: Select the offer you want. You can buy a coupon using your credit card or your Noaat wallet balance.
CouponsOffersPage.step3: Activate at the Restaurant: When you are at the restaurant and ready to pay, simply show the coupon on your app to the cashier.
CouponsOffersPage.step4: Save Instantly: The discount is applied to your bill on the spot.
CouponsOffersPage.offer1: Percentage Discounts: Get 10%, 25%, or even 50% off your total bill.
CouponsOffersPage.offer2: Buy-One-Get-One (BOGO): Perfect for sharing a meal with a friend.
CouponsOffersPage.offer3: Set Menus: Enjoy a full meal for a special, fixed price.

WhyNoaatPage.h1: The Smartest Way to Dine and Save
WhyNoaatPage.metaDescription: Why choose Noaat? Get the best of both worlds: instant coupons and long-term cashback. The only food deals app you need.
WhyNoaatPage.intro: In a world of endless apps, Noaat stands out by being simple, powerful, and built for you. We are your partner in saving money while enjoying the food you love.
WhyNoaatPage.one_app_desc: Why choose between a discount code and a cashback offer? With Noaat, you get both.
WhyNoaatPage.designed_for_egypt_desc: We focus exclusively on restaurant deals in Egypt, bringing you the best restaurant deals that matter to you.
WhyNoaatPage.honest_savings_desc: We believe in real value. Our cashback system gives you real money, and our coupons provide real, instant discounts.
WhyNoaatPage.cta: Join Thousands of Smart Diners Today!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Noaat for customers and partners
FAQ.description: Answers to the most common questions about Noaat

items.question: What are the benefits of using Noaat for my business?
items.answer: Noaat will help you attract new customers, understand their purchasing behavior, and improve your business performance through precise analytics and personalized cashback for customers.

items.question: How does the cashback system work?
items.answer: The customer makes a purchase from you, uploads the receipt to the app, and we review it and give them cashback according to the percentage we agreed upon. You also get detailed analytics about the process.

items.question: Do I need to change my POS system?
items.answer: Not at all, you don't need to change anything in your current system. The customer just uploads the regular receipt you print and that's it.

items.question: Can I control which branches the offer applies to?
items.answer: Yes, you can choose specific branches or all branches for the offer to work in, and you can change this anytime.

items.question: How can I track offer performance?
items.answer: You'll get detailed reports telling you the number of customers who used the offer, total sales, and customer behavior analytics.

items.question: Can I modify or stop the offer?
items.answer: Absolutely, you can modify the offer details or stop it completely anytime through the control panel.

items.question: How does billing and payment work?
items.answer: We work with a transparent system, billing you based on actual completed transactions and providing you with a detailed monthly invoice.

items.question: How do I get cashback?
items.answer: Very simple: eat at a partner restaurant, pay normally, take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app, and you'll get cashback in your wallet.

items.question: How long does cashback take to arrive?
items.answer: Usually it arrives within minutes of uploading the receipt, maximum 24 hours.

items.question: How can I use my cashback?
items.answer: You can use it to buy new coupons with higher discounts, or withdraw it as real money according to the required minimum amount.

items.question: What's required in the receipt?
items.answer: The receipt must be clear, showing the restaurant name, date, and total amount. It must be an official tax receipt.

items.question: Why was my cashback rejected?
items.answer: It might be rejected if the receipt isn't clear, not from a partner restaurant, was used before, or doesn't match the offer conditions.

items.question: Does cashback expire?
items.answer: Cashback in your wallet doesn't expire, but the offers themselves might have expiration dates.

items.question: What's the difference between offers and coupons?
items.answer: Offers give you cashback after purchase, while coupons give you instant discount at time of purchase. Both are useful!

items.question: Do I need internet during purchase?
items.answer: No, you only need internet to upload the receipt later. You don't need internet during the actual purchase.

contact.title: Didn't find what you're looking for?
contact.description: If you have another question or need help, don't hesitate to contact us

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your rights and ensuring a safe and excellent experience
Terms.description: Learn about the terms and conditions for using the Noaat app and platform

sections.title: Definitions and Terms
content: 'Noaat' refers to the Noaat app, website, and all related services.
'User' is any person using the app or website, whether as a customer or business partner.
'Partner' is any restaurant or business establishment registered on the Noaat platform to offer deals and discounts.
'Cashback' is the monetary amount earned by customers after completing a qualifying purchase through the app.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
content: By using the Noaat app, you agree to all the terms and conditions stated here.
If you do not agree to any of these terms, you must stop using the service immediately.
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and you will be notified of any important changes.

sections.title: App Usage
content: You must be at least 16 years old to use the app, or have parental consent.
Using the app for any illegal purpose or prohibited under these terms is forbidden.
You must provide accurate and truthful information when registering and update it when necessary.
You are responsible for keeping your account information secure and not sharing it with others.

sections.title: Cashback System
content: Cashback is calculated according to each offer's terms and predetermined discount percentage.
You must upload a valid and clear tax receipt from a partner restaurant to receive cashback.
We reserve the right to review and reject any cashback request that doesn't comply with the terms.
Cashback cannot be converted to cash except according to the minimum threshold and conditions specified in the app.

sections.title: Partnerships and Offers
content: All offers and discounts are available according to each partner's terms and for a limited time.
Offers may vary from branch to branch and from time to time without prior notice.
Noaat is not responsible for food quality or service provided by partners, we only facilitate access to offers.
In case of a dispute with a partner, we will do our best to help resolve the issue.

sections.title: Privacy and Data Protection
content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data according to our Privacy Policy.
We may use your data to improve the service and provide personalized offers.
We will not share your data with third parties except in cases specified in the Privacy Policy.
You have the right to request deletion or modification of your data at any time by contacting us.

sections.title: Responsibilities and Warranties
content: Noaat is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages that may result from using the app.
We do our best to ensure information accuracy, but we don't guarantee it's completely error-free.
You are responsible for using the app correctly and legally.
In case of technical issues, we will work to resolve them as quickly as possible.

sections.title: Service Termination
content: You may close your account at any time through the app settings.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms.
Upon account termination, some data may be retained according to our legal policies.
Any accumulated cashback will be available for use until the account closure date.

contact.title: Need Additional Clarification?
contact.description: If you have any questions about the terms and conditions, our legal team is ready to help

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal data
Privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data in the Noaat app

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: We collect basic information needed to provide you excellent service such as your name, phone number, and email.
Usage data like which restaurants you visit and what types of offers you prefer to give you better suggestions.
Device and location information (if you allow) to help you find the nearest restaurants.
Receipt photos you upload so we can verify your cashback eligibility.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
content: To provide you cashback service and verify the validity of transactions.
To send you notifications about new offers and cashback you've received.
To improve the service and better understand your needs to develop the app.
To communicate with you if there are any issues or inquiries.
To analyze data to understand user behavior and develop better services.

sections.title: Information Sharing
content: We don't share your personal data with anyone except in the cases specified here.
We share basic data with our restaurant partners only so they can verify offers.
We may share aggregated and non-personal data with partners for analytical purposes.
In case of legal request from official authorities, we will comply with Egyptian law.
With service companies that help us operate the app, but with strong protection guarantees.

sections.title: Data Protection
content: We use the strongest encryption methods to protect your data during transfer and storage.
Our servers are protected with the highest security standards and protection from breaches.
Employees who handle data are trained in privacy and have signed confidentiality agreements.
We regularly review and update protection systems to ensure maximum security.
In case of any security incident, we will notify you immediately and take all required measures.

sections.title: Your Data Rights
content: You can view and update your personal data at any time through app settings.
You can request permanent deletion of your account and data, which we'll do within 30 days.
You can request a copy of all your data we have in an easily readable format.
You can object to using your data for certain purposes like personalized advertising.
You can request correction of any incorrect data we have about you.

sections.title: Cookies
content: We use cookies to remember your preferences and improve your app experience.
These cookies help us understand how you use the app so we can develop it further.
You can control or block cookies through your browser settings.
Some cookies are essential for the app to function and it cannot work without them.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
content: The app is not intended for children under 16 years old.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
If we discover a child has used the app, we will delete their data immediately.
Parents are responsible for monitoring their children's internet usage.

sections.title: Policy Updates
content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to improve it or comply with new laws.
Any important updates will be notified to you in the app or via email.
We recommend reviewing the privacy policy periodically to stay informed of updates.
Your continued use of the app after updates means you agree to the new policy.

contact.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any inquiries about the privacy policy or want to control your data

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Noaat is Egypt's first cashback platform aimed at providing the best dining experience at the lowest cost
About.description: Learn about Noaat's story and how we started changing the way people dine in Egypt

story.title: Our Story
content: The idea of Noaat began from a real need we all faced - the desire to eat good food from our favorite restaurants, but at a lower cost and in a smart way.
In 2024, we decided to change the rules of the game in Egypt and provide an innovative solution that makes every meal you eat give you money back, not just a one-time discount.
Today, Noaat has become the first destination for Egyptians who want to eat the best food for less money, while building real credit from every meal.
We're not just a discount app, we're your partner in the food journey, and our goal is to make every pound you spend return greater value to you.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We aim to make the dining experience in Egypt smarter and more economical through an innovative platform that connects restaurants and customers in a way that benefits everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading food cashback platform in Egypt and the Middle East, helping millions of people save money and experience the best restaurants.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We believe in complete clarity in all our dealings and ensure there are no hidden fees or complex terms

items.title: Speed and Efficiency
items.description: We strive to provide fast and reliable service that makes your experience with Noaat smooth and comfortable

items.title: Continuous Innovation
items.description: We continuously develop our products and services to provide innovative solutions that meet our customers' needs

cta.title: Join the Noaat Family
cta.description: Whether you're a restaurant wanting to increase sales or a customer wanting to save money, Noaat is the right place
